title: manamE unakkhitamaai
sahitya:
manamE unakk-hitamAi oru vArtai sholgirEn kETTukkoL 

(manamE)



pnupallavi



kanaka sabhaiyil natanam puriyum kamala phalattai kattukkoL

kAyamaitta jaTamarindu kAiyangaLaip-pArttukkoL 

(manamE)



caraNam 1



manidariDam mayakka mozhindu mAdhavangaLai shErttukkoL

mAya valaiyaip-pOkki mutti mANikkam veTTip-pErttukkoL

(manamE)



caraNam 2



virindu ninra viSaya virutti vErarupaDat-tETrikkoL

vEda shAstra sampradAya vihitamenru EtrukkoL 



caraNam 3



shurudi maraiyilirukku mudal sakala viSayam paDittukkoL

kAma krOdha lObha mOha kaLvaralla aDittukkoL 



caraNam 4



paruva vayadirkkuLLE unadu bhAvam tolaya AtrikkoL

pAraDanginum cinmayamenru bhAvanai koNDu pOTrikkoL 



caraNam 5



iravu paghalum iDai viDAmal irukkum matiya shurukkiDu

engum nirainda pUraNamenru hrdaya grantiyai nerukkiDu 



caraNam 6



tiru vikarpa niSTaiyAlE nilaiyirc-cenru nerukkiDu

nIDukarpa kyAtiyAga niccayattaip-perukkiDu 



caraNam 7



pATTukkishainda paDikku dinamum paNamanju koDuttANDavan

bAlakrSNa dAsan tanakku bhavattai ozhittu mINDavan 



caraNam 8



nATTamuDanE parama shivattai nambikkai enru nADikkoL

nanmai tImai ozhindu varum jnAnakkalaiyai tEDikkoL



caraNam 9



tETTamAghit-turiyattilirundu teLindudendanam pADikkoL

shIroLiyai veTTa veLiyil shirakkak-kalandu kUDikkoL
